activityname: Conduct system requirement gathering meeting to develop POE surveillance module in eIDSR that capture and visualize events
Conduct one week development work session to support integration of POE system with eIDSR
Conduct 10 days work session to develop POE Alerts to electronically linked to surveillance and emergency management systems through DHIS2
User acceptance testing (UAT) meeting to test functionality of POE integration in eIDSR and POE alerts in DHIS2
Conduct training to 54 POE  site staff and support roll-out to 54 POEs
Conduct a 3 days meeting with all stakeholders to identify and agree on alerts and indicators from the point of entry that will be included when the POE system is integrated with eIDSR

Upgrade existing eIDSR system (USSD) to accommodate new IDSR diseases/events
-Requirement gathering meeting (3 days)
-UAT meeting (2 days)

Support automation of analysis and display of eIDSR dashboards within emmergency management systems
-Requirement gathering meeting
-Emmergency management system as part of requirement gathering meeting
-UAT meeting
-User trainings
Conduct systematic assessment of existing eIDSR system in Zanzibar and provide recommendation for adoption or update of existing system

Support establishment and update of Zanzibar eIDSR system to include POE module: 
Conduct needs assesment meeting
Conduct requirement gathering meeting
Conduct alternative analysis to review different electronic platforms used in other places or countries
Support establishment and update of Zanzibar eIDSR system to include POE module: UAT meeting
Support pilot testing and rollout of eIDSR in Zanzibar

Develop surveilance interactive dashboard that allow user level accessibility at national, regional and district levels. Develop dashboards for DHIS2 data utilization at the national level. This will be accomplished through: 
-5 days SRS development
-5 days work sessions between GOT and contracted developer and 
-3 days UAT

Requirement gathering meeting for Development and implement EBS digital data collection and data entry interfaces (e.g., use of android based mobile applications, scannable data forms and paper-digitalizing systems, tablet-based data forms) that are interoperable and integrated into the national health information systems (eIDSR, DHIS2);
Development workshop, testing and UAT of android application and digitizing data forms
Develop and strengthen electronic EBS to include reporting death happening in the communities
Conduct system developers workshop to digitize EBS signals and expand data uptake and linkages with eIDSR from diverse sources including CEBS, Health facilities, POE, SARI/ILI sites, Food safety
Train health facilities (20 sentinel surveillance sites) in alert generation and reporting for acute public health events
Conduct revised eIDSR  training to 20 sentinel site staff
Conduct supportive supervision and mentorship to 11 existing ILI/SARI sentinel sites
Conduct annual meeting to evaluate use of eIDSR in sentinel sites
Conduct eIDSR step down trainings

Conduct activities to support system integration between National hospitals, RRHs and eIDSR to facilitate automatic reporting.
-System integration requirements collection
-UAT
-User and administrators trainings on updated eIDSR
Support development of integration application to faciliate smooth transfer of data from National Hospitals and eIDSR

Support the roll out of updated eIDSR: 

Internal sensitization meeting of updated eIDSR within the MoHCDGEC including Directors of the Hospitals under MoHCDGEC and reserch institution
Conduct eIDSR system advocacy meetings with other key stakeholders such as PEPFAR implementing partners in regions with sentinel sites
Train ToTs  on updated  eIDSR system
Conduct joint supportive supervision and mentorship including eIDSR performance evalauation
Conduct semi annual review meetings with staff from sentinel sites and evaluate performance of eIDSR
Maintain eIDSR system both Tanzania mainland and Zanzibar
Meeting to collect user requirements for Lab/eIDSR integration
System development to update base eIDSR ready for Integration of laboratory data  to link reported cases with their laboratory results
Link laboratory data with eIDSR at National and selected refferal hospitals
Support strengthening of the electronic COVID-19 result delivery system by developing online  client interface
Conduct UAT meeting to test functionality of lab data-eIDSR link, and online COVID-19 customer interface
Procure IT equipment to support rollout of POE system in 54 point of entries selected in collaboration with MoH
Procure equipment to support use of national level surveillance interactive dashboard that allows user level accessibility
Procure Data management tools  for National and sentinel site data management
Procure Office supplies for ILI/SARI surveillance at National level and sentinel sites
Procure Secondary and backup server for hosting eIDSR system in Tanzania mainland and 1 for Zanzibar
Procure media scanning software to facilitate EBS
